subject: Turn weak product feeds into higher ROAS

Hi Atto,

Google Shopping is one of the biggest drivers of ecommerce growth. It only works when your product data works. Most feeds hold back visibility and performance.

This guide is built for retail and brand teams who own online revenue and want to get more from every ad pound spent.

Inside, you’ll learn:

✓ The feed mistakes that quietly suppress sales

✓ How to structure product data so shoppers find you first

✓ Testing and automation that uncover hidden revenue

✓ Proven examples and checklists your team can use right away

Get Instant Access
